title: What's the name of the novel where a man finds out his mother was actually black, only after his wife kills herself by walking into the river with a baby (with a brown complexion) after being suspected of cheating? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Désirée’s Baby” by Kate Chopin is a short story with that plot. I don’t know of a novel that has it, but I’ve seen at least one TV mystery show that took the premise for an episode, and it wouldn’t surprise me if there was a novel based on it too. I do think Chopin’s was the first however, by virtue of it being published in 1893.
